channel.title: Typepad on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Typepad on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: converting typepad to hugo
item.description: The task of the night was getting a few years worth of Typepad posts into Hugo. My first step was to convert to Jekyll format, which I did using this typepad_to_jekyll Ruby gem: https://github.com/koozie/typepad_to_jekyll You then need to do a few things to get the Jekyll files exactly right for Hugo: Change the date format Rewrite the Categories Download and relink all of the images Changing the format for “date” was a one-liner in perl with the -i (“edit in place”) flag.
